solution_line_template: First, figure out how much punch was left in the bowl before Mark refilled it by subtracting the {gallons_added_to_fill} gallons he added from the bowl's total capacity: {bowl_capacity} - {gallons_added_to_fill} = <<{bowl_capacity}-{gallons_added_to_fill}={punch_before_final_add}>>{punch_before_final_add} gallons

Next, figure out how much punch was in the bowl before Sally came along: {punch_before_final_add} + {sally_drank} = <<{punch_before_final_add}+{sally_drank}={punch_before_sally}>>{punch_before_sally} gallons.

Next, figure out how much punch was in the bowl before Mark started to refill it: {punch_before_sally} - {mark_added_refill} = <<{punch_before_sally}-{mark_added_refill}={punch_before_mark_refill}>>{punch_before_mark_refill} gallons

Finally, multiply that amount by {cousin_drank_multiplier} to find out how much punch there was before the cousin drank half: {punch_before_mark_refill} * {cousin_drank_multiplier} = <<{initial_punch_added}={initial_punch_added}>>{initial_punch_added} gallons
